title: Five-Star Avignon Historic Farmhouse in Captivating Provence with Acclaimed Restaurant
description: Escape to the heart of Provençal France with a stay at the five-star Auberge de Cassagne & Spa, within historic castle grounds in Le Pontet and surrounded by vineyards, villages and Avignon's breathtaking Papal architecture. Repurposing a 1850 farmhouse among Cassagne Castle's outbuildings, the hotel offers guests exquisite French luxury elevated by flawless service. Enjoy every moment spent by the lavender-bordered swimming pool, indulge with a treatment at the sprawling Homerta Spa, savour foie gras and fillet of Saint Pierre at the onsite restaurant or sip your way through the hotel’s exceptional wine cellar - whatever your taste, Auberge de Cassagne & Spa delivers.
